description: Sarah Brightman peforms many of her hits songs in South Africa, Based Upon Her Album Eden.
keywords: live performance,tour,concert film,character name in title
name: Sarah Brightman: One Night in Eden - Live in Concert

original_info.id: Sarah Brightman: One Night in Eden_1999
original_info.name: Sarah Brightman: One Night in Eden

review.name: Sarah is truly the angel of music!
review.reviewBody: It is no wonder Sarah Brightman calls this video "One Night In Eden." You will truly be in paradise when you view it. She sings a number of beautiful songs with her angelic voice. Her range is pleasantly astounding. Whether you're an opera fan or a pop lover, Sarah can do it all in this concert. Just some of the many highlights are "Wishing You Were Somehow Here Again," "Deliver Me," "Eden," "Only An Ocean Away," "The Music Of The Night," "Who Want To Live Forever" and "Il Cuore Mio Va" (the Titanic song in Italian). If heaven is anything like the music of Sarah Brightman, then "who wants to live forever?"
